text: 2.2: 2 Ko 1.6; Ef 3.4; 3.18; Fi 3.8; Kor 1.26; 3.14Gu mba ŋaara mbuav, gu za mben ndavi havharav, mben ndavi khavi, mbe guigira wari won ndavir warir nɨɨŋv, mbe phorgɨp ndava bavira kɨri. Gu khueŋ vuzvugi, nde ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ndirim, mba ndɨkndɨgi nde Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk havhargirga. Gu vhɨra khueŋ vuzvugi, nde vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme mba zorgi buneŋ nɨɨeŋ, nde niŋge kaŋgirga. Krais, ana nduara mba zorga ki bunen nɨɨeŋ ma.
